source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

select  LOCATION_CODE_ID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
B_PUBID,
FP_SITE_ID,
FS_SITE_ID,
OPERATION_ID,
PROFIT_CENTER
 from Retail.locationcode_Initial_VW 
WITH(NOLOCK)

select distinct RSA_ID
,AssociateID
,B_CLASSNAME
,B_CREDATE
,B_UPDDATE
,B_CREATOR
,B_UPDATOR
,FP_SITE_ID
,FS_SITE_ID
,Job_code
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,active_flag
,Activity_type
from Retail.RSA_Assignment_Inc_UKG_VW
where active_flag > 0

select distinct AssociatedID as Associate_ID,
LastName as LAST_NAME,
MiddleName as MIDDLE_NAME,
FirstName as FIRST_NAME,
Startdate as START_DATE,
lastHireDate as LAST_HIRE_DATE,
[Status],
TerminationDate as TERMINATION_DATE,
emailAddress as EMAIL_ADDRESS,
WorkType as WORK_TYPE,
LegalentityID as F_LEGAL_ENTITY,
Job_code as Job_code,
'Associate' as B_CLASSNAME
,getdate() as B_CREDATE
,getdate() as B_UPDDATE
,'semadmin' as B_CREATOR
,'semadmin' as B_UPDATOR
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,FP_Legal_Entity
,FS_Legal_Entity
from Retail.RSA_Associate_Inc_UKG_VW
where active_flag > 0

select distinct AssociatedID as Associate_ID,
LastName as LAST_NAME,
MiddleName as MIDDLE_NAME,
FirstName as FIRST_NAME,
Startdate as START_DATE,
lastHireDate as LAST_HIRE_DATE,
[Status],
TerminationDate as TERMINATION_DATE,
emailAddress as EMAIL_ADDRESS,
WorkType as WORK_TYPE,
LegalentityID as F_LEGAL_ENTITY,
Job_code as Job_code,
'Associate' as B_CLASSNAME
,getdate() as B_CREDATE
,getdate() as B_UPDDATE
,'semadmin' as B_CREATOR
,'semadmin' as B_UPDATOR
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,active_flag
from Retail.RSA_Associate_Inc_UKG_VW
where active_flag > 0
--and emailAddress is not null

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

select distinct AssociatedID as Associate_ID,
LastName as LAST_NAME,
MiddleName as MIDDLE_NAME,
FirstName as FIRST_NAME,
Startdate as START_DATE,
lastHireDate as LAST_HIRE_DATE,
[Status],
TerminationDate as TERMINATION_DATE,
emailAddress as EMAIL_ADDRESS,
WorkType as WORK_TYPE,
LegalentityID as F_LEGAL_ENTITY,
Job_code as Job_code,
'Associate' as B_CLASSNAME
,getdate() as B_CREDATE
,getdate() as B_UPDDATE
,'semadmin' as B_CREATOR
,'semadmin' as B_UPDATOR
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_OPERATIONID
from Retail.RSA_Associate_Inc_UKG_VW
where active_flag = 0

select distinct AssociatedID as Associate_ID,
LastName as LAST_NAME,
MiddleName as MIDDLE_NAME,
FirstName as FIRST_NAME,
Startdate as START_DATE,
lastHireDate as LAST_HIRE_DATE,
[Status],
TerminationDate as TERMINATION_DATE,
emailAddress as EMAIL_ADDRESS,
WorkType as WORK_TYPE,
LegalentityID as F_LEGAL_ENTITY,
Job_code as Job_code,
'Associate' as B_CLASSNAME
,getdate() as B_CREDATE
,getdate() as B_UPDDATE
,'semadmin' as B_CREATOR
,'semadmin' as B_UPDATOR
,Active_flag
,Activity_type
from Retail.RSA_Associate_Inc_UKG_VW
where Active_flag =0
and emailAddress is not null

select distinct RSA_ID
,AssociateID
,B_CLASSNAME
,B_CREDATE
,B_UPDDATE
,B_CREATOR
,B_UPDATOR
,FP_SITE_ID
,FS_SITE_ID
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,active_flag
,Activity_type
,Job_code
,status
,cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_OPERATIONID
from Retail.RSA_Assignment_Inc_UKG_VW
--where active_flag=0




/*
select distinct RSA_ID
,AssociateID
,B_CLASSNAME
,B_CREDATE
,B_UPDDATE
,B_CREATOR
,B_UPDATOR
,FP_SITE_ID
,FS_SITE_ID
,Job_code
from Retail.RSA_Assignment_Inc_UKG_VW
WITH(NOLOCK)
*/

select distinct RSA_ID
,AssociateID
,B_CLASSNAME
,B_CREDATE
,B_UPDDATE
,B_CREATOR
,B_UPDATOR
,FP_SITE_ID
,FS_SITE_ID
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,active_flag
,Activity_type
,Job_code
,cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_OPERATIONID
from Retail.RSA_Assignment_Inc_UKG_VW
where active_flag=0
and RSA_ID is not null

select AssociatedID as Associate_ID,LastName AS LAST_NAME,MiddleName AS MIDDLE_NAME,FirstName AS FIRST_NAME,Status,EmailAddress AS EMAIL_ADDRESS,
WorkType AS WORK_TYPE,RsaID,LocationCode,OPERATION_ID,Profit_center,entity,LegalentityID AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY,B_CLASSNAME,B_CREDATE,B_UPDDATE,B_CREATOR,B_UPDATOR,
StartDate AS START_DATE,Lasthiredate AS LAST_HIRE_DATE,Job_code as Job_code,
TerminationDate AS TERMINATION_DATE
from Retail.RSA_ERROR_LOG_UKG_vw
